feed.title: Track Awesome Tall Stack Updates Weekly

entry.title: Awesome Tall Stack Updates on Nov 09 - Nov 15, 2020
entry.content:
The TALL Stack

  • Tailwind CSS - (Awesome List (‚≠ê14k)) - A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs.
  • Alpine.js (‚≠ê30k) - (Awesome List (‚≠ê1k)) - A rugged, minimal framework for composing JavaScript behavior in your markup.
  • Livewire - (Awesome List (‚≠ê679)) - A full-stack framework for Laravel that takes the pain out of building dynamic UIs.
  • Laravel - (Awesome List (‚≠ê13k)) - A PHP web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax.

Community Websites

  • talltips - Collection of tips and ideas across the TALL stack.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Nov 09 - Nov 15, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Tall Stack Updates on Aug 24 - Aug 30, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries

  • Docdress (‚≠ê64) - A package to create markdown documentations from GitHub repositories in a Laravel-like design.
  • Laravel TTALL Preset (‚≠ê53) - A preset for Turbolinks + TALL stack, bundled with some helpful packages and their configurations.
  • Livewire Datatables (‚≠ê1.2k) - Package to create tables with sorting, filtering, searching, exporting etc.
  • X Blade Components (‚≠ê38) - Ready-to-use Blade components.

Learning

  • üé• A contact form with Livewire and Tailwind CSS - Learn how to build a contact form with Livewire and Tailwind CSS.
  • üé• Blade Component Cookbook - Learn how to build Blade components using Laravel, Tailwind CSS & Alpine.js.
  • ‚úçÔ∏è Building a realtime dashboard powered by Laravel, Livewire and Tailwind
  • ‚úçÔ∏è Building complex forms with Laravel Livewire in Oh Dear
  • ‚úçÔ∏è Embracing The Tall Stack with Event Sourcing, an adventure into the unknown
entry.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Aug 24 - Aug 30, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Tall Stack Updates on Aug 17 - Aug 23, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries

  • Alptail - A collection of open-source UI components, using Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js.
  • Blade Icons (‚≠ê2.3k) - A package to easily make use of SVG icons in your Laravel Blade views.
  • Blade Script (‚≠ê48) - A package to easily add transpiled & minified scripts to your Blade components.
  • Blade Style (‚≠ê19) - A package to easily minify styles and make use of sass, less, etc. in your Blade components.
  • Laravel Form Components (‚≠ê815) - A set of Blade components to rapidly build forms with Tailwind CSS Custom Forms and Bootstrap 4.
  • Laravel TALL Preset (‚≠ê2.6k) - A front-end preset for Laravel to scaffold an application using the TALL stack.
  • Laravel TALL Preset (‚≠ê8) - A preset for installing the TALL stack with just one command.
  • Tailwind UI - Beautiful UI components built with Tailwind CSS. Offers Alpine.js integration.
  • TALL Forms (‚≠ê691) - A dynamic, responsive Laravel Livewire form component with realtime validation, file uploads, array fields, blade form input components and more.
entry.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Aug 17 - Aug 23, 2020
